              [
                "SQL"
              ]
            ],
            "title": [
              [
                "CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE times (dt DATETIME, ts TIMESTAMP);\nSET time_zone = 'UTC';\nINSERT INTO times VALUES(NOW(), NOW());\nSET time_zone = 'SYSTEM';\nSELECT dt, ts, TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, dt, ts)offset FROM times;\nDROP TEMPORARY TABLE times;"
              ]
            ]
          },
          "type": "code",
          "version": 8
